p: Many green microalgae/cyanobacteria are also reported to excrete intracellular hormones to their surroundings which help to stimulate plants growth [ 261, 262, 263]. Examples are the green microalgae, Chlorophyta and Cyanophyta [ 264] and some cyanobacteria strains which produce cytokinins and auxins which help to stimulate plants growth parameters such as shoot length, root length, spike length and weight of seeds [ 265].
